ResearchProjectDef.label: Glass making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make glass in ovens that can withstand high temperatures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Corned beef
ResearchProjectDef.description: Meat product obtained by long-term aging of meat in table salt. The process of getting corned beef is called salting. Salting is a possible type of long-term storage of meat at positive temperatures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lessons from the past
ResearchProjectDef.description: Living in harmony with nature was not easy. Your ancestors have come a long way to what you have now.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tribal clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Simple, shabby clothing can help you get through bad weather.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple wood processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic knowledge of wood will allow you to use them for the production of various materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fishing I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to fish with primitive traps.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fishing II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new ways to fish.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Time to experiment! Start creating your own recipes to satisfy your needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced wood processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new ways of working with wood and learn how to create new structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Instruments I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create the simplest tools to make your job easier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Instruments II
ResearchProjectDef.description: It is much more convenient to work with strong tools than with simple natural counterparts. Learn to create easy-to-use tools for the job.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Instruments III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create advanced multi-tools for factory work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: In a world full of danger, limbs can be easily lost. It is worth considering a primitive alternative.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make simple mechanical limb prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make new prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make new prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Games I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Work is work, but you also need to be able to have fun! Create simple ways to cheer up your settlers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: First alcohol
ResearchProjectDef.description: You need to be able to relax. Learn to make berry wort as the simplest fermentation product. In addition, learn how to create special fermentation barrels.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Distillation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore the fermentation process in more detail to discover the possibilities of distillation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Leather floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover beautiful but demanding leather floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Leather floors II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover beautiful but demanding leather floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wooden floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Stop walking on cold ground! Your knowledge of woodworking opens up the possibilities of wood flooring for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Floor decoration I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Try decorating the floor with something to create a cozier atmosphere. Learn to create simple rugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Floor decoration II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create beautiful and soft rugs to create coziness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Floor decoration III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create beautiful and soft rugs to create coziness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sleeping on the ground is bad for your health. Learn to Build Simple Furniture for Basic Comfort.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple hygiene
ResearchProjectDef.description: Keeping your body clean is essential for survival.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple stone processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first steps in stone processing. Learn to create sculptures, break stone debris into building materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blacksmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Processing of minerals to obtain metals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive metal processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Getting metals is half the trouble! Learn to craft simple metals for simple tools, weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: World and you
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's time to leave their native lands and see what is there, behind the fence...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mysticism and rituals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Give your buildings a little mysticism and meaning.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now is the time to seriously consider providing yourself with delicious and nutritious food. Discover new ways to handle food.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft leather armor for increased protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive bows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Face-to-face combat is dangerous, so learn to kill enemies from a distance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved bows
ResearchProjectDef.description: New types of bows will allow you to deal more damage and hit targets at an even greater distance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: Wild animals and hostile people constantly threaten your safety, but you can try to hide from these misfortunes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: People and animals are not scary when you are behind a stone wall or palisade. Probably...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology moves your life forward by helping you cope with adversity. Keep up the good work, or fall in front of them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced stone processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: By improving the skills and knowledge gained, you will be able to use the stone even more efficiently.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallic floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coating composed of metal plates or cast plates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallic floors II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coating composed of metal plates or cast plates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallic floors III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coating composed of metal plates or cast plates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors VI
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Joinery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade the production of wood components and items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wooden floors II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore new ways to install wood floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a primitive machinery for the production of fabrics from plant materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic health care
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nursing is an essential element in the survival of your community.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple health care
ResearchProjectDef.description: Let the doctors at this time be pretty crazy, but even so, you have more chances to survive than without their help.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Assembly technology for simple and comfortable furniture using bed linen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ergonomics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's good when all the necessary tools are in place. Learn to craft handy sets of items for the craft.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's handy to have the materials you need on hand, isn't it? Learn to create simple and spacious storages.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create more secure storage structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create more secure storage structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create more secure storage structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Exquisite furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to assemble beautiful furniture worthy of kings!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Monuments I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build natural monuments to decorate the settlement.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Monuments II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deepen your knowledge in the construction of majestic monuments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Monuments III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build magnificent monuments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Games II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to have fun with mind games.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new ways to cook delicious food.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Preserving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Are you tired of food spoiling too quickly? Perhaps you should turn to canning to preserve them for years to come?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Beekeeping basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Have you been stung by a nasty bee again? It seems time to pacify them and make them work for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of alchemy by learning how to create primitive potions and gunpowder.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combustible mixtures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to synthesize hazardous combustible mixtures from sulfur, crude oil, or other products.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Architecture
ResearchProjectDef.description: The emergence of new ways of storing information, the discovery of new materials makes it possible to create more complex structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: EquipmentModification
ResearchProjectDef.description: So, you have a good understanding of the basic armor templates. How about trying to change them for yourself?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapons I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for creating new types of weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapons II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for creating new types of weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sewing simple clothes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creation of simple and comfortable clothes from fabrics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Linen fabrics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for sewing linen-based fabrics. The fabrics are elegant and lightweight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Silk
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create soft and delicate silk fabrics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basics of mechanic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Labor mechanic is the first human achievement in the field of production optimization.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanical mills
ResearchProjectDef.description: Are you tired of using manual labor in such a common thing as making flour? You seem to have found a great solution to this question.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Printing press
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create machines for mass production of paper and books. Knowledge to the masses!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gemstone processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain knowledge for gemstone processing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved ore mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ever-increasing demand for metals requires more optimal methods of obtaining ore.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Safety engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Compliance with safety measures will protect your means of production from destruction, and workers from disability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced quarry design
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade underground track tunnels to avoid frequent collapses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced mines ventilation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Install ventilation ducts inside mine tunnels to avoid poisoning and gas explosions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved ore processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The correct approach to ore processing will allow you to get more resources while saving them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Assault weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cannonballs and huge arrows. A great addition to the assault army.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Guns fire
ResearchProjectDef.description: The smell of gunpowder and the rumble of shots are what accompanies the appearance of cannons on the battlefield.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medium guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Medium and slow guns designed to siege or attack infantry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Heavy and slow guns designed to siege or attack infantry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modified guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Specific heavy gunpowder guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology has dramatically advanced your life, paving the way for accomplishment. Don't stop in your knowledge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ancient and time-tested weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to forge simple blades to arm the militia.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blunt weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Don't have funds to break through your armor? Try to use stunning techniques and break the bones of the enemy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy leather armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Protect your body with durable leather armor. It will not save you from a strong blow, but at least it will prevent you from chopping off your limbs instantly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chain armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Protect your body from slashing sword strikes with a chainmail layer of armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Archeology
ResearchProjectDef.description: While wandering around the world, you might stumble upon bizarre bones or remains of ancient civilizations. It is worth exploring this in more detail and getting the maximum benefit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced archeology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to accurately locate ancient remains in order to mine them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Architectural engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start designing and building more complex and complex structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: A deep study of the interactions of different substances with each other opens up new perspectives.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Petrochemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dive into petrochemistry to learn how to process oil and natural gas to produce materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nitrogen fertilizers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial fertilizer from chemical reagents.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deeper knowledge in the field of medicine will increase the chances of survival for your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deeper knowledge in the field of medicine will increase the chances of survival for your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam energy I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start creating steam generators and steam engines that can be used in all areas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steammechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build steam machines to meet basic industrial needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam smelter
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial foundry for mass production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam mechanical forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial forge for the manufacture of complex components, edged weapons and equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam jetpack
ResearchProjectDef.description: Steam packs consume coal to generate thrust for short jumps.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automaton production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for the automaton production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam energy II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade your steam plants to automate and simplify even more complex processes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam centrifuge
ResearchProjectDef.description: The mechanism is designed for washing of materials to search for useful resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam drill
ResearchProjectDef.description: The steam drill is designed for autonomous extraction of resources underground.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Seismological sensor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Installation for the slow analysis of underground soil for the presence of useful resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam energy III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade your steam plants to automate and simplify even more complex processes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam mixer
ResearchProjectDef.description: The steam mixer is designed to mix various liquids and materials, for example to produce concrete.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam crusher
ResearchProjectDef.description: The steam crusher crushes the ore to the state of ore powder. Additional processing allows you to get more resources when smelted.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Steam mechanical miner
ResearchProjectDef.description: Autonomous steam miner digging rocky soil on the surface of the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build simple electronic devices and low-power computing devices.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial crusher
ResearchProjectDef.description: Electric crusher for efficient rock crushing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Radio
ResearchProjectDef.description: A tower for collecting radio signals and for broadcasting them. Using radio, you can communicate with factions of the appropriate technological level.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Decorations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Try to diversify your interior with something interesting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Decorations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Try to diversify your interior with something interesting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: IEDs II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover new means of protection using electronics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MaterialsScience
ResearchProjectDef.description: Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of materials and start exploring for even more complex materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Practical chemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore the preparation and production of more complex chemical compounds to create advanced materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increase production speed to accelerate industrialization.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electrolysis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover electrolysis for new types of materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Defense structures
ResearchProjectDef.description: New horizons promise not only discoveries. Start creating new defensive structures to protect yourself.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ballistics
ResearchProjectDef.description: For the production of more complex and deadly weapons, it will be necessary to study the behavior of projectiles in more detail.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial ore processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: New ways of processing ore will allow you to process ore faster and get more from it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Forming press
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial device for the production of various standard mechanisms and templates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electric heating
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construction of electricity-to-heat converters for a cheap and easy way to heat a room.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agronomy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover new ways to increase the volume and quality of crop production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fertilizer production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create powerful biological fertilizers to significantly increase soil fertility.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pesticides
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start treating your crops with pesticides. This will protect them from pests and increase productivity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: A large number of mouths makes a friend look at the process of food production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking V
ResearchProjectDef.description: New technologies are opening up even more advanced ways of cooking.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plant based meat
ResearchProjectDef.description: Plant-based meat is made from plant proteins and is perceived as meat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Meat extract
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for the production of nutritious and non-repulsive meat products from insects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking VI
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make new sweets and gourmet dishes using new and unusual ingredients.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking VII
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automate food preparation using special devices.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ergonomics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: New era - new tools. Learn to create even more and multi-tasking craft kits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ventilation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover various simple indoor temperature distribution and control devices.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Complex clothing II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use new materials to create durable clothing for any situation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flak armor II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start producing medium protection classes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flak armor III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start producing heavy protection classes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thrown weapons I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of new throwing weapons to hit targets at a distance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thrown weapons II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of throwing weapons using advanced chemistry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Complex furniture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provide your colonists with the most comfortable furniture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Complex furniture III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provide your colonists with the most comfortable furniture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light easel weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of small caliber machine guns. Easel guns are characterized by low mobility, but increased accuracy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light easel weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of medium-caliber mounted guns to combat well-defended enemies and fortifications.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon mdification
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deeper study of ballistics and new materials make it possible to bring firearms to the ideal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial refrigeration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creation and use of a special refrigerant for cooling rooms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light easel weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of large caliber mounted guns for maximum protection of your settlement.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medium artillery
ResearchProjectDef.description: The production of medium artillery will help provide significant support in both defense and assault.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy artillery
ResearchProjectDef.description: The production of heavy artillery will allow you to deliver massive attacks on the enemy, minimizing your losses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Auto turrets I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of automatic turrets that do not require an operator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Auto turrets II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of automatic turrets that do not require an operator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cryogenic rectification
ResearchProjectDef.description: Separation of air and water into components for further use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fuel Gas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Obtaining hydrogen and carbon dioxide for its further conversion into fuel gas - a very flammable and calorific fuel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dangerous gases
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial mixing, processing and processing of gases and liquids to produce new ones.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Oil production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creation of mechanisms for extracting oil from the bowels of the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic oil processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Primary oil processing through distillation in distillation columns to obtain medium and heavy oil fractions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic polymerization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Processing petroleum products will make it possible to obtain new materials through polymerization and other processes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic oil processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The full oil processing cycle will allow us to fully process all petroleum products to obtain maximum benefits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced polymerization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use of all petroleum products to obtain a full range of materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Repair machine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced repair machine for repair and disassembly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tube computers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technologies are becoming more and more complex and for further development we need to resort to computing systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced repair machine
ResearchProjectDef.description: High-quality repair machine for repair and disassembly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced alloys
ResearchProjectDef.description: The development and creation of new types of alloys will make it possible to create more reliable structures and expand construction possibilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial wells
ResearchProjectDef.description: In the future, you will need huge amounts of water, which will be difficult to obtain without industrial drilling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rimatomics
ResearchProjectDef.description: A probe has been detected in orbit! It seems to be sending signals to the surface; maybe we can decipher its message.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electric fertilizer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Autonomous device for applying fertilizers to the soil. Allows you to maintain the level of fertile layer for agricultural soils.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Working exoskeleton
ResearchProjectDef.description: Exoskeleton to cushion the stress of heavy work. Equipped with an additional manipulator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rocket fuel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combustible fuel for launching various devices into space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Satellites
ResearchProjectDef.description: The launch of a satellite is a big step for science. Satellites can perform a variety of useful functions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Satellite storages
ResearchProjectDef.description: Durable storage facilities for maintaining a small number of equipment in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Residential satellite module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Module for storing food to support people in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Satellite communicator
ResearchProjectDef.description: The satellite communications module will allow you to communicate with other spacecraft in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Satellite science module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Science modules speed up research when the satellite has enough energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Batteries II
ResearchProjectDef.description: New era - new tools. Learn to create even more and multi-tasking craft kits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Satellite lander
ResearchProjectDef.description: The landing module allows you to land the satellite on the surface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Autofarm
ResearchProjectDef.description: Autonomous farm for growing crops. Requires a light source as well as a supply of liquid fertilizer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Terraformer
ResearchProjectDef.description: A device for carrying out terraforming in an area, as well as for excavating soil.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shock crystals
ResearchProjectDef.description: A special material with electrical potential. Reacts to damage with an explosion.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bioelectric capsules
ResearchProjectDef.description: Xenotechnology for extracting energy from living beings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Manhattan Project
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start a project to develop a nuclear bomb.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bunkers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create fortified bunkers to protect against nuclear attack.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Nuclear Power Plant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore new nuclear power plant options to obtain even more energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Autonomous nuclear power plants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create autonomous power sources based on radioactive materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced design
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design and create complex buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production III
ResearchProjectDef.description: This planet is too small for you and it's time to expand your knowledge beyond it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore the possibilities of using energy to create a new type of weapon.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modern melee weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: A line of modern weapons for close combat fighters.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Livestock I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to breed non-aggressive animals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Livestock II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Apply new knowledge in the process of domesticating livestock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mineral feed
ResearchProjectDef.description: New, higher quality feed for livestock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial feed
ResearchProjectDef.description: New, higher quality feed for livestock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Feed concentrate
ResearchProjectDef.description: New, higher quality feed for livestock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Livestock III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Expand your knowledge of animal husbandry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Livestock drugs I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create medicines and preparations that accelerate the growth of livestock and increase their productivity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Livestock drugs II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create medicines and preparations that accelerate the growth of livestock and increase their productivity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Veterinary station
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automate the livestock vaccination process.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Livestock IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master animal husbandry to perfection.
